content.text1: Built for demanding workflows, InDesign integrates smoothly with Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Acrobat, InCopy, and Dreamweaver software.   InDesign offers powerful features for creating richer, more complex documents and reliably outputs pages to multiple media.
content.title2: Why attend one of our Adobe InDesign courses?
content.text2: Attending our InDesign courses allows participants to explore more creative possibilities and experience new levels of productivity using Adobe InDesign page layout software. Our course attendees learn how - with its sophisticated design features and enhanced productivity tools for streamlining repetitive task - InDesign lets you work faster and better than ever.

content.text1: Adobe Illustrator software allows you to create sophisticated artwork for virtually any medium. Industry-standard drawing tools, flexible colour controls and professional type controls help you capture your ideas and experiment freely.
content.title2: Why attend one of our Adobe Illustrator courses?
content.text2: Taking our courses will highlight timesaving features such as easier-to-access options to let you work quickly and intuitively. Gaining skills in the improved performance and tight integration with other Adobe applications will also help you produce extraordinary graphics for print, web and interactive, and mobile and motion designs.

content.text1: Adobe Photoshop is software that is extensively used for raster image editing, graphic design and digital art. It makes use of layering to allow for depth and flexibility in the design and editing process, as well as provide powerful editing tools, that when combined, are capable of just about anything.
content.title2: Why attend one of our Adobe Photoshop courses?
content.text2: Taking a course on Adobe Photoshop is essential if you work in a graphic design, web design, or user experience roles. It is also equally important to learn Photoshop for those working in hands-on marketing roles. Whether creating flyers, brochures, or email newsletters, there is a need to know Photoshop for optimizing and retouching images. You can learn Photoshop even if you are a beginner with no previous experience on our expert instructor-led courses.
